title: Bellarine Peninsula 13th Beach Championship Golf Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Get ready to rendezvous on the green with a stay at 13th Beach Golf Lodges, a spectacular golf retreat along Victoria’s iconic Bellarine Peninsula. Home to the prestigious Victoria Open, this retreat boasts two award-winning golf courses - each maintained with first-class, year-round conditioning - and is located just minutes from the region's pristine beaches. The Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for its world-class wineries: follow your own wine trail to Bellarine Estate Winery, Oakdene Vineyards Cellar Door, and Scotchmans Hill, all within a 30-minute drive. 

This is the perfect spot to practice your swing, nab a hole-in-one, and admire the incredible surrounding coastal landscapes. When you're not on the course, enjoy an exquisite meal at the modern clubhouse restaurant and savour prime views over the sprawling beach course. The 13th Beach is also a renowned surf beach, so grab a board and hit the waves, or simply enjoy a sunset beach stroll.
offer_address: 1732 Barwon Heads Road, Barwon Heads, Victoria 3227, Australia

title: Barwon Heads Champion Golf Retreat 90-Minutes from Melbourne with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Get ready to unwind in luxury at a stunning golf retreat nestled along Victoria’s iconic Bellarine Peninsula. This exceptional Barwon Heads hotel offers an unparalleled experience for golf enthusiasts, featuring two award-winning courses maintained to the highest standards year-round.

Home to the prestigious Victoria Open and located just moments from pristine beaches, it provides the perfect setting to practice your swing and enjoy breathtaking coastal views.

When you upgrade your package, enjoy the added perk of one round of 18 holes during your stay. When you're not on the course, indulge in gourmet dining at the hotel's modern clubhouse restaurant, where you can savour delicious meals while overlooking the expansive Beach Course.

For those seeking adventure, the nearby Thirteenth Beach offers fantastic surf conditions, or you can simply relax with a serene sunset walk along the shore.
offer_address: 1732 Barwon Heads Road, Barwon Heads, Victoria 3227, Australia

title: Apartment Escape in the Picturesque Bellarine Peninsula
description: Get away from it all and soak up the beauty of the Bellarine Peninsula with a stay at Barwon Heads Resort at 13th Beach, ideally located between Geelong and Torquay, surrounded by two renowned golf courses. Stay in an ultra-modern one or two-bedroom apartment and enjoy a bottle of Angove wine on arrival and a guaranteed late check-out until 11.30am.
offer_address: 13th Beach Golf Links, 36 Fourteenth Rd, Barwon Heads VIC 3216
